projects.name: AI SafeScape – AI-Powered Detection of Online Harassment
projects.description: AI platform that ensures safer digital interactions by detecting harmful, misleading, or fraudulent content in real-time.
projects.detailedDescription: AI SafeScape identifies profanity, scams, misinformation, and visual manipulation (including ASCII-based evasion). Integrates Google Cloud NLP, Vision, and Gemini Pro Vision APIs for multimodal threat analysis.

projects.name: Smart Car Parking System
projects.description: Efficient parking management system leveraging advanced data structures.
projects.detailedDescription: Developed using Arrays, Linked Lists, and B+ Trees to manage parking slots. Supports insertion, deletion, and optimized search operations to ensure minimal time complexity for slot allocation.

projects.name: Large Number Calculator
projects.description: 1024-bit calculator handling signed decimal numbers up to 309 digits.
projects.detailedDescription: Implements string-based arithmetic for large numbers, performing addition, subtraction, and multiplication beyond native data type limits with precision and carry/borrow logic.

projects.name: Operating System Shell
projects.description: A mini UNIX-like shell implementation written in C.
projects.detailedDescription: Implements core shell functionalities such as command parsing, process creation using fork/exec, input-output redirection, and basic pipelining. Focuses on low-level OS concepts like system calls and process control.

projects.name: Email Analyzer
projects.description: Python script for parsing and analyzing email metadata and content.
projects.detailedDescription: Automates extraction of sender, recipient, timestamp, and keyword analysis from raw email text using NLP techniques. Useful for security auditing and inbox analytics.

codeSnippets.code:
import re

def extract_sender(email_text):
    match = re.search(r'From: (.*)', email_text)
    return match.group(1) if match else None

projects.name: NyaySaathi – Legal Aid Platform
projects.description: A front-end platform aimed at providing legal awareness and assistance.
projects.detailedDescription: Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to serve as a digital helpdesk for citizens to access simplified legal information and resources. Focuses on UI clarity and accessibility.

codeSnippets.code:
Welcome to NyaySaathi

Your companion for understanding your legal rights.

projects.name: C_N_LAB – Computer Networks Simulations
projects.description: Python-based networking lab assignments and simulations.
projects.detailedDescription: Includes Python implementations for CRC error detection, Hamming code, and basic socket programming examples to demonstrate computer networking concepts practically.

codeSnippets.code:
def crc_encode(data, key):
    appended_data = data + '0'*(len(key)-1)
    remainder = mod2div(appended_data, key)
    return data + remainder

projects.name: Developer Portfolio Website
projects.detailedDescription: Personal portfolio showcasing projects, skills, and achievements. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Uses JSON for dynamic content loading and supports dark/light themes.
